exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM Q' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2213 ?M2214 ?M2216 ?M2217 ?M2220 ?M2223 ?M2224 ?M2225 ?M2226 ?M2230 ?M2228" with "(let (x, _) := a in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) (a :: Q')".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H_in : In a Q' Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M4784 ?M4785 ?M4787 ?M4788 ?M4791 ?M4794 ?M4795 ?M4796 ?M4797 ?M4799 ?M4800" with "(let (x, _) := a in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) (b :: Q')".

original: intros a Q H_in. destruct Q as [|b Q']. - inversion H_in. - simpl in H_in. destruct H_in as [H_eq | H_in]. + subst. apply CombLinear_incl. auto. + apply CombLinear_reducestar; auto.
